definition: steps/flight of steps/step (over obstacle)/fig. way out of an embarrassing situation/bench (geology)
to find an excuse/to look for a pretext

sentences.english: Water inched its way up the steps as first as first-floor outside walls collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 当一楼外墙塌陷时水慢慢地沿着台阶漫了上来。

sentences.english: A numerical study is reported on the flow over a backward-facing step.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究单边放大台阶流的数值解。

sentences.english: The steps had been worn away by the feet of thousands of visitors.
sentences.chinese: 参观的人成千上万，把台阶踩得不像样子了。

sentences.english: Could smell you as I was coming up the steps.
sentences.chinese: 我走上台阶时，就闻到了你身上的异味。

sentences.english: I step off the kerb and a cyclistnearly knocks me down.
sentences.chinese: 我从台阶上走下来一个汽车的人差点把我撞倒。

sentences.english: Reaching the number, he hurried up the steps and did not spare the bell in waking the servant.
sentences.chinese: 到了公寓，他急忙跨上台阶，照旧按铃叫醒了女仆。

sentences.english: Then he descended the steps of the Temple and all the people followed him.
sentences.chinese: 他步下圣殿的台阶，人们跟随着他。

sentences.english: You can also perform calf raises on a step.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以在台阶上做站立提踵。

sentences.english: Tassels on the horns of a dilemma, back to the husbands family and no steps, had to find treasure complex complaint.
sentences.chinese: 流苏进退两难，回婆家又没台阶，只得找宝络诉苦。

sentences.english: I saw you sitting on the step and writing something. What were you doing?
sentences.chinese: 我看见你坐在台阶上写什么。你在干什么呢？

sentences.english: The problems in the blasting of the short terrace tunneling in Shijianling Tunnel are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了石宽岭隧道短台阶掘进爆破施工中存在的问题。

sentences.english: Try to avoid running down the steps, the impact is too large, small step slow.
sentences.chinese: 尽量避免跑下台阶，这个冲击太大，小步缓行。

sentences.english: An overhead view of the south stairs reveals the deference of the stairway to the topography.
sentences.chinese: 南部台阶的顶视图揭示了这些踏步对于地形的尊重。

sentences.english: The tin can bounced down the steps.
sentences.chinese: 那听子一路颠跳着滚下了台阶。

sentences.english: He declared again, and he went down the steps.
sentences.chinese: 他又说了几句，然后才走下台阶。

definition: flight of steps/(fig.) a means of advancement/stepping stone
to walk slowly up a flight of steps (idiom)
Gaotai county in Zhangye 張掖|张掖[Zhang1 ye4], Gansu
to step in/to stride forward/to forge ahead
